body: So the first 2.5 pages had me going "OK, this has some potential..." after 2.5 pages, when that blank bald dude appeared on the bottom of page 3, I was like "alright, we got paper cut-outs for the guys...", and then soon after "uh, this dude got lazier and lazier by the pages"; and so yep, this is the result of a hobby project that was done half-heartedly.
